page.title: 18 Enville Estate Farms.
page.content: Herons Gate-J.Fletcher owns 60 acres in our D block 34 fresians 40 calves-beef dairy milked 2x.1000 galls p.a.20 sheep clun & crew,clipped 2xp.a.Free range hens.Grass,barley+kale- cows-silage. Potters Cross Farm-Mr.Evans owns 42 acres in middle of housing est.Planning permission refused 4 yrs ago.Originally cleared woodland.30 steers, 3 fresian-beef.Still ferns & blackberr- ies,heavily used footpath crosses land- causes problems.Boundaries-Blackthorn hedges & barbed wire 2 wells now un- used .Own some machinery. Pigeon House-700 acres(500 in D block) Mr.Brown owns 50 acres 300 head cattle -fresian.11,500 chicks-poultry unit- 1350 sheep(cross bred)16 rams dipped 2-4 times pa.1 working sheepdog,100 acres wheat+barley 60 acres oil seed rape+potatoes,roatated annualy-2 wor- kers-tied cottages.
